divs: Sighting DetailsI came back to my house from 1week trip and after enterance to yard I saw some movments and several objects with diffrent shapes arounnd the yard wals and over it, human likes there was very incridible then I goes near and take some pictures by my mobile phone , when I repeat Isee some of them take some thing like camera toward me and consequently my mobile hanged on ( no key acts). I realised some thing they cary upward and to right hand like escenteric engine shaft, the face & body of them start to changes. I reset my mobile by put off battery cell and insert again and this time I start to take movie of them, about 45 second of those movments recorded, then suddenly my surronding went dark and phone hangedup again. after all I realised all of them wents. now I have several pictures and 1 movie cilp from this scene.all with out retouch and real.I ready show to some one specialist about this case and some times I saw one or up to three of them with transparents UFO around that place . even I could take some other pictures. Its very important which I treatend by them when i try to arrange and save photos and movie! I khow this is very hard to belive but I promise all are only real experience of me!
